{{ZScriptNote}} __NOTOC__
native clearscope vector2 '''Vec2Offset'''(double x, double y[, bool absolute]) const
== Usage == Calculates a 2D offset from the caller's current xy origin by the given amounts. This should be used over doing it manually since it is portal aware. Note that the values are not relative to the caller's current angle but are absolute. This function will not modify the calling Actor's position.
=== Parameters === *''x'' - The amount to offset by on the x axis *''y'' - The amount to offset by on the y axis *''absolute'' - Default is false. If true, completely ignores portals.
=== Return value === Returns a Vector2 containing the new offset position.
== Examples == {{noexamples}}
